Class OOBN.DoubleVector

  Summary 

public class  DoubleVector
     extends java.util.Vector
{
          // Constructors 1
     public DoubleVector(int);

          // Methods 3
     public void append(double);
     public double get(int);
     public void set(double, int);
}

A DoubleVector is a vector whose elements are of type double. Since these elements have to be converted to an Object of type Double, some methods which do the type conversion are supplied.
